topic: Generative AI Ethics and Governance

  entities:
    Generative Models|Technological Concept
    Developers|Researcher
    Organizations|Organization
    Human Decision-Makers|Social Concept
    Stakeholders|Social Concept

  proposition: Generative models should be designed to ensure fairness and ethical principles.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Generative Models|DESCRIBED_BY|fairness
    Generative Models|DESCRIBED_BY|ethical principles

    entity-entity relationships:
    (no explicit relationships in this proposition)

  proposition: Generative models must uphold broadly accepted moral values.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Generative Models|MUST_ADHERE_TO|moral values

    entity-entity relationships:
    (no explicit relationships in this proposition)

  proposition: Generative models must minimize biases in all user interactions.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Generative Models|MUST_MINIMIZE|biases

    entity-entity relationships:
    (no explicit relationships in this proposition)

  proposition: Generative models must be respectful of user differences.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Generative Models|MUST_BE|respectful

    entity-entity relationships:
    (no explicit relationships in this proposition)

  proposition: Developers should use external mechanisms to make model outputs more transparent.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Developers|MUST_IMPLEMENT|external mechanisms
    Generative Models|REQUIRES|transparency

    entity-entity relationships:
    Developers|RESPONSIBLE_FOR|Generative Models

  proposition: Human oversight is required throughout the entire model development process.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Human Decision-Makers|ROLE|oversight

    entity-entity relationships:
    Human Decision-Makers|CONTROL|Generative Models

  proposition: Developers and organizations must be identifiable and responsible for model behaviors.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Developers|MUST_BE|identifiable
    Developers|MUST_BE|responsible
    Organizations|MUST_BE|responsible

    entity-entity relationships:
    Developers|PART_OF|Organizations

  proposition: Generative models must prioritize harmlessness while maximizing helpfulness.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Generative Models|MUST_PRIORITIZE|harmlessness
    Generative Models|MUST_MAXIMIZE|helpfulness

    entity-entity relationships:
    (no explicit relationships in this proposition)

  proposition: Models must protect physical, digital, and reputational resources.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Generative Models|MUST_PROTECT|physical resources
    Generative Models|MUST_PROTECT|digital resources
    Generative Models|MUST_PROTECT|reputational resources

    entity-entity relationships:
    (no explicit relationships in this proposition)
